title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: I've had 2 of these, the first I bought, used for awhile as a glorified computer speaker hooked to the AUX input.  It worked well for that purpose.  Once I tried using it as an actual bluetooth speaker... no good.  Bluetooth will repeatedly drop.  I tested with multiple devices of several brands (phones, tablets, even my laptop) and all had the issue.  I was ultimately refunded my money, but also sent another unit (in a different color, and different lot code so different batch).  Still the same issues.  As a wireless bluetooth speaker this just doesnt work.  5 songs if you are lucky but most of the time you can't get through a single song before it drops.  It's a shame as would have been nice had it worked.

title: Makes loud static sound
text: I accidentaly ordered two of these instead of just one. But when I opened one and charged it I was thinking I might keep both. It was solid had good weight looks good I love the green and black . Yah I really want to keep both. ( just to let you know where im coming from in this whole thing.I became diabled in 2019 been through five surgerys and still not getting better and unable to work. So zero income. When I got my stimulus check I really streched it as far as possible. And definatly wont wast money on something that does not work properly. ) I have gone through quite a few speakers and this one was looking really good right now and I was starting to imagine using them both in dual mode but then i turned it on and yes it sounded good until the bass. It hit hard but it was accompanied by a cracling / rattling sound I hoped it was the recording so I tried switching songs then I tried changing the EQ but the crackling was always there. So sadly I have to give one stare to a speaker I had reallly started getting excited about. I mean the bass is the main selling point eaven if the rest of the sound was crisp but there is nothing you can do about the bass. You know the sound of your friends priemium car stereo when the base hits so hard everything rattles it was much the same. It was sitting on the carpet with nothing touching it so im guessing it was most likely an improperly assembled speaker. In my disapointment I decided to return them both I did not want to return the other one as used also so I did not charge it and compare. But looking back if I had tested it and it worked properly I would probably have kept it and given a better rating. So just treat this review as cautionary.

title: Bluetooth continuously drops
text: Ordered a W King D8 in 2019, and based on other reviews, must have been sent a defective product. I would have returned it, but it sat unopened for about 2 months after i bought it. Absolutely no bass response no matter how or where I positioned it. To say it had a thin, tinny sound would be a compliment. I am truck driver, and wanted something with decent sound quality to use in the cab at night. Our trucks are all new, top of the line, so fairly quiet. At 80 percent volume, less than 2 feet from my head, I could not make out what song was even playing on this thing with the truck idling. Over 80 percent, it distorts so badly you cant tell whats playing anyway. As a lifelong musician and audiophile, I know how to get a good sound out of my equipment, even decent sound out of poor equipment. No matter how i tweaked this thing, the best sound i could get was on par with an AM radio being played through a bullhorn. My phone speaker SOUNDS BETTER and is LOUDER. Gave it to my daughter after she saw it sitting around and asked about it. She ended up throwing it away because she couldnt hear it over the shower or when walking if it was windy at all, and she had no other use for it. My son has a $10-15 speaker (i-room I think?) that sounds 10 times better than this, and is louder. Could have been a defective unit i guess, but I do not recommend wasting your money to find out.

title: Hard hitting Crackling / rattling Bass üò£
text: I bought bother so I could connect it together. The first one didn't work it wouldn't connect or turn off once it was on so I returned it and they exchanged it, when the second one arrived I was able to pair 2 together and they worked really well for a few month. The sound with both of them together is really nice, u can feel the bass on your body if you walk between them so I love that, but it didn't last for long because after sometime one of the speakers would connect and it started doing what the previous one did, once it was one u can't turn it off or reset to connect to the Bluetooth. So now I have one working speaking and one bad one. And I can no longer return or exchange because I'm out of my return window. So DON'T SPEND THIS AMOUNT OF MONEY ON SOMETHING THAT WILL ONLY WORK FOR A COUPLE OF MONTHS.

title: Defective? Sounds awful
text: Honestly it sounded pretty great with on and off usage over about 13 months. Then, it turned Into a brick. It‚Äôs frozen. Reset button doesn‚Äôt work. Letting the battery 100% drain doesn‚Äôt work. I‚Äôve searched all over the web for a solution and nothing works. Emailed the company,  no response. It‚Äôs useless and I‚Äôm out $80.

title: It's just a NO
text: Bought two of these budget speakers and wow: sent them packing the next day after receiving them. I have two ooz angle 3‚Äôs setting in my garage that are 3 years old. I have used them very well. Even taken them camping and use the for outdoor events. The batteries are still going strong. The sound is amazing, considering the size, and cheaper than these King of Craps. Was looking for better sound quality and higher quality db‚Äôs.Not here ... stay away from these budget speakers. Period. Best Buy has a whole row of these things and will price match. Listening to them you can tell that ever manufacture has their niche ... I went with JBL ... but I am biased because I have JL in both my home and car. It‚Äôs worth the money out of pocket. If you are on a budget I highly recommend the ooz angle 3‚Äôs.Pros: They connected wellShipped fastVery well packagedCharged fastCons: Sound quality is horrible! At any volume. At any eq. Just totally horrible!They are heavy and hard to move around.They are plain green and ugly tbh. The plastic mold is tacky and cheap.Battery drain is much faster than advertised.Conclusion: in a consumer world you get what you pay for. There are literally 100‚Äôs of the same products online that are made in China and all of them are money pits. Invest your money in good sound. Go to Best Buy or your local shop and listen to well established products if you can.Hope this helps everyone! Cheers! To good sound! (AKA: you are not gonna find it on Amazon)

title: Sounded good until it stopped working
text: So i wanted to test this out before leaving a review. Battery life I can get probably 14-16 hours at most at 3/4 volume. Not bad but not what is advertised. What I‚Äôm noticing now is let‚Äôs say battery dies and I put it on charger, I can‚Äôt reconnect til battery maybe is quarter charged before I can pair again and listen. Honestly it‚Äôs not a bad speaker but not worth asking price. If I was priced lower I would recommend but not for price.PS: the w kings customer service is horrible. After lack of communication from them. I probably would not recommend this speaker at all

title: JUST FYI: TERRIBLE PRODUCT
text: This speaker won‚Äôt turn on. Its fully charged and I can see three dots light on. I tried all the tricks but no help. It has not been 1 year. I thought it might be covered under some manufacture warranty but I can‚Äôt find warranty details anywhere including manufactures website.

title: Not a good or bad speaker
text: I sent one back because we thought it was faulty and had them ship the same one to replace it. Same problem! Won‚Äôt stay hooked up to my phone and keeps shutting off. My friends and I tried everything to figure it out. Nothing worked.

title: Speaker won‚Äôt turn on
text: Product was great while it lasted.  Battery simply won't charge rendering it junk.  Too expensive for the lack of quality.

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: This unit was a huge disappointment.  Description says LOUD, it is not.Description says three different equalizer levels, the difference between the three settings is almost unperceivable.Can't really attest to battery life since I had it less than two days before returning it.For about $25 more, I found a way better, way louder, way more customizable equalizer than this unit offers.DO NOT WASTER YOUR MONEY.

title: Makes loud static sound
text: ** see update, speaker is now broken***These aren‚Äôt ‚Äústudio quality‚Äù speakers like some might have you believe. But for the money, you cant go wrong with it.  It‚Äôs LOUD, and the battery lasts a long time. My only wish is that the strap came off.  I actually use this inside my work truck for streaming videos and TV during downtime, and for the phones navigation or as a speakerphone.  It sits perfectly on the transmission  access panel on the 8500 series gmc which is actually a shelf., and streams audio off my phone quite well.***UPDATE ****  less than a year old and the power button is broken.  The speaker will no longer turn on and is completely useless.  The battery level indicator lights all light up, but the speakers power switch has lost its 'click'. Considering this has spent the entire time I've owned sitting on a shelf INSIDE THE CAB of a large truck, never being carried or tossed around, that's pretty pathetic.  The unit is otherwise in perfect condition, but has now become an $70 paperweight.I have NO intention of even wasting my time trying to get support from an off brand company like this, which will probably just turn into even more aggravation.  I cant stress enough of what an easy life this thing has had, so to break in less than a year under light use is just unacceptable. I will NOT be purchasing another one of these to replace it.

title: Below average sound.
text: Not as loud as advertised, so dissatisfied with that.

title: Broken in less than a year.
text: I bought this speaker for my  Christmas present and only lasted one month and half. I only used like five times. The speaker won't connect to Bluetooth or turn on/off. Don't spend your money on this worthless crap.

title: W King Speaker
text: Update.The company has taken no action much less contact with me. This is not where you want to waste your money much less the aggravation of terrible customer service.I ordered 2 originally and both failed within a few months. They were replaced and now I have another 2 dead speakers. Frustrated that not 1 out of 4 work.I would have a hard time spending money on any of this brands products after this experience.

title: Not worth it
text: Loudness and quality for $75 is definitely not worth it... I was definitely expecting more, I use this only in my shower but still not satisfied with the sound for the price. Bass sounds forced and can't play to the max volume without distortion. Would not recommend

title: UPDATE
text: This thing really cranks for its size, while maintaining decent fidelity, especially if you put it diagonally in the corner of a room. At moderate levels the fidelity is even better. The 4 (I think) EQ settings are all usable as far as correcting/enhancing how you want your music to sound, but don't expect tons of adjustability. It also appears to be very robustly constructed. It has considerable weight. For those wondering about the overall size of the unit, it's about the size of a loaf of sliced bread.On to the BAD. It goes out of sync with the video on EVERY source I've tried it with including a Win 10 PC, several Android devices and an iPod. I don't get it. No other BT speaker I've owned has ever had this issue. It's SUPER annoying and the only remedy I've found is to power cycle the speaker. This has to be done every 10 min or so, or whenever you can't take the lack of sync becomes too much to tolerate.If you're gonna use it to watch movies, YouTube vids, etc, be prepared for a VERY annoying experience.....Or just avoid this one and find a brand/model that doesn't have A/V sync issues.

title: Sound quality is worth $20
text: Total piece of crap

title: Almost great but GOES OUT OF SYNC
text: Sat on a shelf for four months, worked fine. Then sudden'y couldn't turn it on, only charges and discharges. Nothing connects to it, bluetooth refuses to turn on. Not worth the price.

title: Absolute garbage.  Dont waste your money.  Battery sucks.  Not loud at all.  Buy a Wonderboom
text: Got this in May of 2021 and used it like 6 to 8 times if that. Went this weekend to charge it and it will not take any charge. I got a monster speaker about 6 months before I got the W king speaker and that monster speaker still holds a longer charge then this w king speaker ever did. When the W king speaker worked it sounded good, I use the speaker when I'm riding my bike so I have it mounted on a rack and don't always use that bike so thats why I've only used it like 6 to 8 times. Figured it should have last a few years not just one.

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: I'm not happy with the product. Bought it on a whim because it was cheaper than the competition, and looked rugged and manly. I also happened to own a competing brand speaker (JBL) and by comparison, this product has been somewhat of a disappointment.  The speaker quality is subpar.  After a few uses, the speaker buttons are no longer responding; the LED lights are on, but no-one is home.  Should have just gone with the tried-and-true JBL.

title: Makes loud static sound
text: Last about 2 hour on a charge, the other brand I ordered cuts out. When will the Chinese make a better product, I guess when I buy one designed in the USA

title: buttons not responding after only a few uses
text: Speaker now will just work as a charging station! Will not power on for speaker. No connectivity or sound only charging ports are working. You get what you pay for here!Update. Reached out to me wanting to make up for the product being a failure. Go through all communications and wanted to warranty replace! After giving All of the info needed nothing but silence!Doesn‚Äôt look like my unit willBe replaced as they had told me it would.

title: Battery LIfe
text: Junk

title: Speaker is junk after two months. Update!
text: I'm so sorry I bought this item.  It's very frustrating when the Bluetooth disconnects and it happens constantly.  Useless product really.  I'm ready to throw it out since I'm past the warranty coverage.

title: Junk
text: Really disappointed about the loudness of this speaker. All twitters even with its EQ which The settings have little to no difference. Little to now lows (no bass). I‚Äôve gotten more bass from smaller speakers.Build quality well it feels durable and battery life claims hold water.I like the usbc charging I feel it will last a long time. The IO choices on this speaker are good.If they could tune this speaker to double the amount of lows while keeping battery live they‚Äôd have a winning product. I‚Äôm short I have buyers remorse. I gave it an overall score of one star because it should have at minimum double the bass. ‚ÄúExample I have a small Bose it measures 1.5‚Äù tall is squarish in shape 3‚Äùx3‚Äù and it has more bass indoors and out doors than this monster of a speaker‚Äù

title: Bluetooth randomly and regularly cuts out.
text: I bought this Bluetooth speaker to use in my barn while working with my horses. It worked just great for 3 1/2 months, at which point the on off button refuse to work. Could no longer turn it on, turn it off, or pair to my iPhone.  Of course, the ‚Äúfree warranty‚Äù was for 90 days. Very, very disappointed in this product.

title: I‚Äôve gotten 100% more loud Lows ‚Äúbass‚Äù from speakers half the price
text: While listening to some music the speaker just shut off and wouldn't power back on. The battery wasn't dead but I plugged it in and let it charge overnight. Next morning it still won't power on. I always took care of it. It has never been dropped. It was a really nice speaker until now.

title: It worked great, until it didn‚Äôt!!
text: I bought two of these speakers and loved them.  At times the blue tooth connection was challenging, but I loved the base for the price.  However both speakers are dead as both batteries have died And WILL NOT TAKE A CHARGE. I am throwing them out.  A waste of some $175.  Run away.

title: Only lasted a little over a year
text: The battery did not last as advertised 40 hours of playtime. The battery lasted only about 6 hours long I had to recharge it again. The sound was not bad but not as perfect as I expected, and I wanted much louder. I plan to return it.

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: Dead at 9 months! Used for MAYBE 6 hours when I first got it, then opted to use a physically smaller speaker. When I went to use it again, it not only did not take a charge (using 3 different chargers), it never even powered on. Hmm, seems like a common complaint, doesn't it?Don't say you haven't been warned. Buy something from a more reputable company like Anker. I've used the their Soundcore for FIVE YEARS and it's worked flawlessly. This W-KING is cheesy JUNK

title: Makes loud static sound
text: I ordered these and the little pair of oontz at the same time AND THEY SOUND THE SAME!!!!! I'm mad because I even slightly believe that those little oontz have MORE BASS!!! I bought them for my semi truck to have some sort of surround sound when I'm watching TV with my truck off and since the oontz are WAY SMALLER, I brought them with me,since they take up less space & basically sound the same as these huge things. I would send them back,but don't want to go through the hassle. Its just a learning experience to go to the store and listen to stuff before I purchase it. At least they are loud,but I've heard smaller portable Bluetooth speakers get much more bass & I bought two of these things,since they pair together which is very cool,but the oontz does the same for cheaper & more compact.

title: JUNK! BUY SOMETHING ELSE
text: Worked as expected initially.  Currently the unit is unresponsive to the buttons used to turn it on or off.  The battery power indicator light stays on and shows unit as fully charged.  The reset button has not corrected the current state of the speaker.  The unit currently functions as a battery bank and I am in the process of depleting the current battery charge in hopes that it resets the speaker.  I will update this review if I discover a work around.

title: No bass,just loud and rugged looking
text: Charge don't last that long and the speakers eventually tend to lower in volume within months.

title: Stopped Working after just over a month
text: I was surprised how well this worked at first. I was probably not the typical user as I was not needing something durable. It moved in my home only 3 times. It was played sparingly, never dropped, and had no contact with water. I thought it would last but now the item will not power on or charge. I'm extremely disappointed in this.

title: Charge don't last that long and the speakers eventually tend to lower in volume within months.
text: DISAPPOINTED! 4th PURCHASE! THEY ARE TRYING TO RIP ME OFF! THEY WON'T REPLACE MY SPEAKER UNTIL I GIVE THEM A 5* REVIEW. THE SPEAKER and THE COMPANY are NOT GOOD. NOT CONSISTENT TECHNOLOGY.UPDATE: W-KING SENT ME A REPLACEMENT for 1 of my silver W-KING D8's but now I paired my original silver one and it is distorted and sounds like a blown speaker. I NEED A REFUND on THAT ONE IMMEDIATELY! I CAN'T EVEN PLAY IT... as for my other 2 silver ones are paired well and sound okay.OLDER REVIEW:TWS UNEVEN! I CAN'T EVEN DO an HONEST YOUTUBE REVIEW on MY CHANNEL... BECAUSE....THIS SPEAKER IS MUCH LOWER SOUND THAN THE OTHER. THIS IS MY 4th PURCHASE of this item (3 silver ones)... 1 BLACK ONE! SOUND INCONSISTENT... MY FIRST SILVER ONE...is THE ONLY ONE THAT SOUNDS GOOD! NEED REFUND or MAYBE A FIRMWARE FIX for THE D8. I NEED A NEW ONE that has even sound.

title: DO NOT BUY! - This will not last
text: Volume too low, worse speaker than my $20 alexa

title: SO DISAPPOINTED! 4th PURCHASE! THEY ARE TRYING TO RIP ME OFF!
text: I really wanted to like this speaker, but the sound quality is just okay. The description said 3 sound settings, but they barely change between them, and the battery is awful. I bought this a while ago and barely use it b/c of the battery life. It's also so bulky and heavy for the sound quality it provides. Overall not worth the money I spent.

title: Volume too low, worse speaker than my $20 alexa
text: Waited a very long time to get the speaker. Was really looking forward to it. When it arrived it felt really Stout and solid. Bluetooth hooked up super easy. Volume fluctuates continually up and down. Switched over to my JBL to make sure it wasn't my phone or the song, and it play just fine. Check four more songs and all played poorly on the w- king, and played fine on the JBL.

title: Battery lasts less than three hours and takes longer to charge
text: Not happy with the sound output. Not much louder than my AM radio.

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: Won‚Äôt power on. Won‚Äôt take a charge. Tried different reset as manufacturer suggested.

title: Makes loud static sound
text: Was very excited to try out this speaker before packing it up and taking it on my vacation. Turns out this piece of crap speaker doesn't even charge. I tried everything; from using different cables including the one it came with and trying out different power sources but nothing worked. Was so disappointed that I had to return this, and look for a new speaker and hope it arrives in time. I guess the only positive was that I had issues with it on Day 1 while I could still return it and not after the it was too late to return. Will never buy this brand again and would not recommend to anyone!

title: Quit working after 90 days.
text: Felt it was a very low quality build. Started having problems a couple months ago. Stopped charging fully a week or so ago now. Now it won‚Äôt charge for more than maybe a bar and a half worth of a full charge. Save your money and just get a jbl. Fwiw you buy the charger separately too. If you don‚Äôt wait for it to be totally connected before you start to play music I noticed it would call the last number I dialed which I felt was very strange also. Can‚Äôt recommend

title: What a piece of crap!
text: I bought this for my kid for indoor and outdoor use-have JBL and Bose @ home immediately got  rejected it mentioning sound quality is very poor -I did nt believe it initially but when i tested  my self using various music and settings ! nothing helped to improve quality .I m going to return it - Bad experience

title: No charger included. Not very loud. Low life span on charge at max volume.
text: The speaker isnt too bad, and the unit is solid, however all the goodness of this unit is undone by the SUPER ANNOYING low battery warning! Instead of a subtle beep or flashing LED, it plays a jingle and repeats itself over and over every 30 seconds or so for over 3 hours. Even when Charging! The jingle overtakes the bluetooth audio. What a massive design fault :( I would rather the unit go flat than repeat this stupid jingle which makes the unit unlistenable on low battery.....effectively reducing the limited battery life even lower.also, as an aside, the strap is useless for me, and it is not removable so had to cut it off. would be much more useful if the buckles could be undone, or attached via velcro so that the strap could be reattached if required.overall not a bad speaker, just some very annoying quirks that ruin it :(

title: Just Loud -flat sound profile -lack deep bass
text: It worked pretty good until it just stopped coming on only a few months after I purchased it. It is showing all three lights when charging but still won‚Äôt come on. Wasted money! As usual, even though I‚Äôve only had it a few months, I can‚Äôt return it so I guess I use it for a boat anchor.

title: SUPER ANNOYING low battery warning!
text: Ok speaker. It's loud but very flat sounding. It's great for voice but has a complete lack of bass. I do not believe this has acsubwoofer as advertised. My old 35w subwoofer far surpasses this speaker.Also take note that the product photo descriptions do not match the written product description.I would not recommend.I did find a solution for audio delay during movies: if you press the equalizer mode button, it'll synch the audio up perfectly.

title: Lasted just long enough that I can‚Äôt return it.
text: Read lots of reviews on lots of different speakers.  The W-King D8 had great reviews, but this speaker has no bass at all and sounds terrible compared to my Harman/Kardon Onyx Studio 4 (which won't turn on anymore).  I don't know why folks gave this W-King such high marks.  It's inexpensive, but there's no bass compared to the Onyx Studio 4, the mids and highs don't sound good either.  Since my Onyx Studio 4 died after 1.5 years, I figured I would try another brand.  May have to just hope my Onyx 4 was just a bad unit and get another one, or maybe try something else, but this W-King does not have good sound quality at all compared to my Onyx Studio 4 (or my older Harman/Kardon Go+Play mini).  And no, I don't work for Harman.  I returned this immediately.

title: Flat bass
text: Stopped worked after only having it for a little over a month. Good sound quality but, wish it would of worked ALOT longer. It currently has the power button on but, won‚Äôt turn off. It won‚Äôt connect to phones and this happened about 4 days ago‚Ä¶.

title: Other reviewers are crazy or have poor expectations
text: First I lost my return window by 4 days . With the first charge it sounded and paired perfectly . Once I got to the second charge it will not ! So it was a total waste of money . I had hopes for this but I should have listened to other reviews. I honestly felt that those people were just doing something wrong. But seriously it isn‚Äôt rocket science, it‚Äôs a Chargeable speaker that doesn‚Äôt charge.

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: Great sound....But after less than a year it won't charge up any longer.  It seems that many have this problem.So sad...

title: Makes loud static sound
text: Sound is poor and Bluetooth is a joke . Go with something better . Very disappointed ! Seller has contacted me and promised to make things right but has yet to keep promise !

title: Won't charge after less than a year.
text: So bummed. It plays via Bluetooth for no longer than 5 minutes before needing to be reconnected. The battery life is about 45 minutes. I‚Äôm not sure if I got a lemon but I had high hopes for this speaker.

title: Junk
text: Not waterproof. Tittle is Mis-leading - maybe water resistant - even that is a stretch. Had some light rain - killed it. Will not power up or charge. Even after letting it dry out in the sun.

title: Great when it works
text: This will only last a couple months.  I've tried two of them. Don't waste your money unless you never use it. They use a cheap battery that won't change after a couple months of use. Then it's completely worthless even plugged in

title: Not waterproof like it says. Light rain killed it - had it for 60 days.
text: This speaker doesn‚Äôt come with an effective charging cable, and now won‚Äôt recharge. We are, of course, now outside the 30 day return window and are stuck with a useless speaker. It won‚Äôt even turn on

title: After a couple months it will FAIL!
text: This was wasted money! The blue tooth connection was always dropping. Other speakers worked fine. Clarity was always bad and volume was always distorted! Terrible product

title: Piece of junk - won‚Äôt charge
text: I was so excited because of all the great reviews, but my speaker emits a low high pitch squeal. Even when turned all the way down! It boggles mind that I have to pay for shipping to return a damaged item for a replacement when it was no fault of mine!!

title: Crap
text: Speaker will not power off and will not connect to Bluetooth.. contacted customer service via email and they replied back once‚Ä¶ have emailed them several times and no response. Have tried resetting this speaker and nothing works.. finally after 2 weeks it finally died. Now will not charge or turn back on..

title: Don't let all the good reviews fool you!!
text: Honestly the sound was great but I bought it at Christmas for us to use by our pool in the summer. It didn‚Äôt even last a month and a half and it‚Äôs completely dead and won‚Äôt work!

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: Purchased this speaker and it was supposed to come with two cords for charging and did not come with either. Presumably this had been previously returned and was not repackaged correctly.

title: Makes loud static sound
text: I liked the size of this and was hoping I could use it but it turned out that it will not connect to the Wi-Fi/Bluetooth on my stereo so I had to send it back.

title: Missing parts
text: After a handful of times being used, the connection stopped working and is now worthless. Very disappointing

title: Disappointed
text: I used it one time attached to the back of my jet ski not hanging in the water and it died. I had it replaced did the same thing and dead again. YOU HAD ONE JOB!!! FAIL!!!!

title: BT doesn‚Äôt work
text: The sound is good. However after a month of minimal use, it quit charging.  I changed cords and nothing.  I have a useless speaker than I can no longer return.

title: Waterproof my butt!!
text: Worked 3x then bluetooth started getting choppy, now won't stay connected, stays on & i have to do the hard reset.. That doesnt fix the problem it locks up again & drops bluetooth.. Speaker is fully charged, speaker was never abused or left to the elements.. No reason for it to wick out with such little use..

title: useless after a month
text: Bought this radio end of May .. started using it in June and worked great ! It‚Äôs now First of August and it will not turn off or connect anymore! Money wasted !

title: Bluetooth stopped working after 3rd use.. Stuck on & had to reset, same issue again..
text: Bought this device after researching reviews on Amazon and took it out on a boat the day after it arrived and was fully charged.  The second time I went to use the device, again after a full charge, nothing.  The device never once again turned on after that first use.  Tried multiple times but decided to return to Amazon. The warranty card that came with the device gave a URL for a non-working website.  I would recommend avoiding this device.

title: Quit working after 2 months
text: This W King was not used very often and recently  stopped working. It will charge but the on/off button will not work and now it‚Äôs out of warranty.

title: Disaster of a product
text: Well, we have had 2 of these and they both have had issues with the charging port.  Once it gets loose you cannot charge it anymore so its completely useless. Get about 6 to 8 months of usage before the charge port break. New charge cords does not help.  If you don't move it and leave it in one spot it probably would last longer but if you actually use it as a portable speaker it will not last.  Sad because it does sound really good but quality is not good.

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.
text: Promotes longer battery life than most all other speakers of same size. Fact is? Didn't last 25% of proclaimed life. Returned on a rocket!

title: Makes loud static sound
text: This is the second D8 I purchased. The first is working fine. This one doesn't seem to work at all. My Amazon orders take months to get to me, so if it doesn't work, the return window is past. Very frustrating. The white  leds on the top are lit up, three of them. But pushing the power button, holding any of the buttons, etc. produces no response. Plugging the speaker in with an aux cable also does nothing. Sad.

title: Yeah right
text: My second one - first was replaced for the same issue !Gets a full charge but doesn't turn on.Waste of money.

title: White LEDs are on and nothing else
text: Connects to my note via Bluetooth for about ten minutes before it starts to act up and then no more sound via speaker. Can turn off have to press reset button and then it will reconnect for about five seconds before it gives me the same problem. Don't buy it it's not worth it

title: power button breaks rapidly!
text: the seller advertises these speakers as being waterproof.  According the Webster's dictionary, waterproof means impervious to water.  I left the speakers out in a bit of rain and much to my surprise, the insides of the speakers filled with water and stopped working.  The company said they would issue me a refund if I bought another pair and I agreed.  Since that tine, they have ignored my messages and won't cooperate.  DO not buy these speakers.

title: Trash, waste of money
text: Update; originally I gave it 5 stars but now that I‚Äôve had it for a while I can write a more accurate review. I don‚Äôt use it very often. Once a week maybe. Battery used to be great. Now it doesn‚Äôt charge while plugged in. When I know the battery is low but I‚Äôm trying to listen to music I‚Äôll plug it in but it won‚Äôt charge and die anyway. That‚Äôs just ridiculous.Love this speaker. I haven‚Äôt had to recharge it yet. Battery life is amazing. I wish it was louder but for the price I can‚Äôt complain.

title: These are not waterproof, dont be fooled by the company
text: This speaker went through a light rain and it fried the buttons on top rendering the speaker useless.

title: Not so great after all
text: I read everything no one really discussed the battery problem. It doesn‚Äôt hold a charge the battery life is horrible. I had an ion Bluetooth speaker 39 watt upgraded to this speaker that‚Äôs 50 watt. This speaker doesn‚Äôt sound better than the 30 watt. I wish I‚Äôd returned this speaker !Waste of money

title: Not waterproof
text: Really unhappy with this speaker. Honestly disappointed.  I should have gone with Ecoxgear. I thought this speaker would be much louder as I was comparing it to my old Eco speaker. At full volume if this speaker is in my bedroom, I can't even hear it from my kitchen. Waste of money.

title: Junk
text: I bought this speaker because it said waterproof so I could take to the River, lake, pool, etc. I‚Äôve had a jbl waterproof speaker that fell int he water several times and kept on going, even an Altec speaker. This one fell in the water once and is a goner. Water poured out of it and it never worked again. Sound is decent but do not buy if you‚Äôre looking for a truly waterproof speaker.

title: Stopped working on second day.
text: It had nice base and good sound for the price but it developed loud static (super loud background gray noise) within just 6 months and it is now useless.

title: Absolutely NOT Waterproof
text: It's sounded great for a while. But sitting in one place it just quit working. It sits in my shop where I work. It's connected to power supply and just stoped charging. To expensive for it to quit already. No way to contact seller that I can find.

title: Don't Buy! Developed Loud Static Within 6 months

title: Won't charge!!!
text: This lasted less than a year, with minimal use, until it started crackling on all the louder notes.  Also, it's not as loud as I expected after reading other reviews.  Support is in Chinese, not even sure if a warranty exchange is possible.Updating review.  No customer support.  I reached out through Amazon a month ago and got no response.

title: Stop working in a month
text: First the battery life is terrible. I  Told the seller.  They said they would send a replacement.  Its been almost a year and im yet to receive it.  I went tubing and brought the speaker.  Not waterproof at all.  Never submerged in water and speaker stopped working right away.  Seller doesn‚Äôt stand by there product.  Ive bought cheaper Bluetooth rugged speaker and it lasted me 8 yrs with many tubing trips.  This isnt the one

title: Not loud, not reliable long-term
text: If you're looking for bass this is NOT the product you want. If you're looking for something to use outside in an open area this is NOT the product you want. As for inside, the high/mids might sound alright in a small to midsize room, but when you get outside the sound quality and high volume depreciate completely. Not good at all! It's quite distorted and muffled sounding. After seeing all the good reviews I thought this was a sure thing. Not at all. I'm starting to think amazon allows paid or fake reviews.

title: Terrible.  Not even for the money
text: Everything works great except for the main thing, THE SOUND QUALITY. I feel like I have been raped and taking advantage of. I guess I will have to send it back.

title: Not waterproof!  Keep indoor
text: This speaker touts its waterproof and durability. We bought two bc my husband works in a factory and needed something durable. He dropped it once and the power source stopped working - the battery life was never great. He took it apart and it‚Äôs mostly hot glue (he works in a glue factory btw), and terrible soldering. We‚Äôre well past the point of return (maybe 6 months for the second we bought bc of the Bluetooth together option).

title: Sound quality is not great and it doesn‚Äôt work properly
text: Lots of power, Great Battery Life, Compact size, Appears durable. However after 6 weeks of very light use one of the speakers blew and it sounds terrible now. It got light use and sat in one place the entire time I used it. Would not recommend. Most reviews on Amazon are "right out of the box" no one seems reviews on items that have actually been put through the paces seem to be buried in the pile or non existent. Purchase carefully internet shoppers.

title: Construction is not good
text: My small JBL blows this speaker away on all levels. The sound in my opinion is not loud enough and poor quality. The speaker is not clear and the bass muffled. title: Only lasted one use! Junk!
text: I've been using this speaker for a few months now. It's a loud speaker and has good range on it. I've probably charged it about 12 times. And today the charging port fell in. I took it apart to discover that the charging terminal just came off the mother board. So now there's no way to charge the speaker.  So therefore if I can't charge it then I can't use it which makes it junk.

title: this thing completely died on me in 3 months
text: I was hoping to use this speaker as a portable car speaker. It can barely be heard on the highway with the windows down. A fender 10watt amplifier for $30 is just as loud, if not louder than this so called 50watt speaker. The battery does not last very long either. It broke after 4 months.

title: Poorly made
text: Sound quality was okay when it was working. Couldn't complain much for the price. But mine stopped powering on even though it was fully charged. Hasn't been that long since I got it and it looks new. Pretty disappointed on it's reliability.

title: Lacks volume
text: I used this speaker once for about 8 hrs and then it died. I‚Äôve changed it back up but it will not turn on again since then. I‚Äôve pushed the reset button but nothing, the battery indicator shows it‚Äôs fully charged (3 led lights) but it will not turn on :( it was a really great and loud speaker but sadly it turned out to be a disposable 1-time use item :(

title: W- King 50 Watt Speaker. Is it Worth the money spent ?? I think it reallY is.

title: Makes loud static sound

title: Junk product, junk company, works ok for a few months

Very dissatisfied the speaker malfunctioned after only 3 months of light use and I was never offered any warranty so I cannot get it fixed or replaced. I am not pleased whatsoever!

title: Died after 1 year

title: Stopped working after 3 months!
text: I've used this speaker maybe 10 times. I've charged it 4-5 times with the same charger. Today the charging port got super hot, melted, and started smoking. Stay away from this speaker. It sounds decent but is also a fire hazard.

title: Doesn‚Äôt last
text: The sound quality is quite impressive but no matter what audio source I choose through Bluetooth, there is a noticeable audio sync/lip sync gap. I‚Äôve tried connecting to my AppleTV/FireStick4K/SamsungTV and all sources have this delay.I can‚Äôt overlook it being an audiophile, it‚Äôs simply unusable currently. I have a Bugani and Soundcore so I‚Äôll switch back to one of those. I might have a defective unit but unimpressed as of now.
